sentence.Network_en: Unless you are an escapologist of Mr Cayne's calibre.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非你有Cayne那种逃脱术的本事.

sentence.Network_en: The couple left United States and toured Europe, where Houdini was acclaimed as a brilliant " escapologist. "
sentence.Network_cn: 这对夫妇离开美国到达欧洲, 胡迪尼 在那里被公认为最厉害的[逃脱大师].

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(E2)|无忧教育 ... escapist 逃避现实的 escapologist 表演脱身术的人 escapology 脱逃术.
胡迪尼擅长逃生，被称为拥有专门技术的「脱身学人」（escapologist），是比「魔术师」与「魔术家」更高一筹的神级，假如这门学 …

entry.def: An escapologist is someone who entertains audiences by being tied up and placed in a dangerous situation, then escaping from it.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who is expert in the art of escaping
